description:
Tree works in a conservation area
Notification has been received for the following works:

Rear garden of 41a Tollington Park
X1 Pear - Crown reduce by up to 25%,  remove crossing branches, lift by removal of lewer branches to a height of 2.5m , cut back to clear building if necessary by up to 2m
X1 Sorbus - Reduce back property side by 20%,  remove crossing branches, lift by removal of lewer branches to a height of 2.5m , cut back to clear building if necessary by up to 2m

Rear garden of 41b Tollington Park
X1 Pear - Crown reduce by up to 25%,  remove crossing branches, lift by removal of lewer branches to a height of 2.5m , cut back to clear building if necessary by up to 2m

Rear garden of 41c Tollington Park
X1 Pear - Crown thin by up to 10%, remove crossing branches, lift by removal of lewer branches to a height of 2.5m , cut back to clear building if necessary by up to 2m
